title: Service Fabric Cluster Management Patterns
body:
Cluster endpoint management:

- Clusters stored in extension settings (sfClusterExplorer.clusters array)
- Local dev cluster default: https://localhost:19080
- Certificate-based authentication: thumbprint, commonName, PEM cert/key pairs
- Cluster configs loaded from globalStorage on activation
- PowerShell integration for local dev cluster deployment (DevClusterSetup.ps1)

Key constants in sfConstants.ts:
- SF_SDK_DIR: C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft SDKs\\Service Fabric\\ClusterSetup
- SF_HTTP_GATEWAY_PORT: 19080
- SF_HTTP_GATEWAY_ENDPOINT: http://localhost:19080

Always validate cluster connectivity before operations. Use SfConfiguration class for cluster state management.
rationale: Critical patterns for cluster connectivity and authentication that must be followed for cluster operations
